documentType.label: other
reasons: Document is an informational policy/definition page without invoice layout, CMR structure, or UB-04 fields

fields.name: Hospice Care
fields.value: Hospice Care is Qualified Long Term Care Services provided in the event you are diagnosed with a terminal disease. Hospice Care helps you, your primary caregiver and your Family with the physical, social and spiritual needs brought about by your terminal illness.

fields.name: Hospital
fields.value: Hospital is an institution or facility that is:

fields.name: Hospital_condition_1
fields.value: licensed as a Hospital by the proper authority of the state in which it is located; or

fields.name: Hospital_condition_2
fields.value: accredited as a Hospital by the Joint Commission on Accreditation of Hospitals (JCAH).

fields.name: Licensed Health Care Practitioner
fields.value: Licensed Health Care Practitioner is:

fields.name: Licensed Health Care Practitioner_condition_1
fields.value: a physician as defined in section 1861(r)(1) of the Social Security Act; or

fields.name: Licensed Health Care Practitioner_condition_2
fields.value: a Registered Nurse; or

fields.name: Licensed Health Care Practitioner_condition_3
fields.value: a Licensed Social Worker.

fields.name: Licensed Health Care Practitioner_additional
fields.value: The Licensed Health Care Practitioner must not be a member of your Family. Nor can the Licensed Health Care Practitioner nor any member of the Licensed Health Care Practitioner’s Family be an owner or in any way control the operation of a facility in which you receive care or treatment.

fields.name: Licensed Social Worker
fields.value: Licensed Social Worker is a duly licensed social worker acting within the scope of their license at the time the treatment or service is performed.

fields.name: Licensed Social Worker_additional
fields.value: The Licensed Social Worker must not be a member of your Family. Nor can the Licensed Social Worker nor any member of the Licensed Social Worker’s Family be an owner or in any way control the operation of a facility in which you receive care or treatment.

fields.name: Maintenance or Personal Care Services
fields.value: Maintenance or Personal Care Services is any care provided primarily to give needed assistance to you as a result of your being Chronically Ill (including protection of your health and safety due to a severe Cognitive Impairment).

fields.name: Medicare
fields.value: Medicare means the Health Insurance for the Aged Act, Title XVIII of the Social Security Amendments of 1965 as then constituted or later amended.

fields.name: Mental or Nervous Disorders
fields.value: Mental or Nervous Disorders are: affective disorders; anxiety disorders; personality disorders; psychotic disorders; or other mental or emotional disease or disorders. This does not include Alzheimer’s, Parkinson’s, or other demonstrable organic diseases such as senile dementia.

fields.name: Nursing Home
fields.value: Nursing Home is a facility or a distinctly separate part of a hospital or other institution which:

fields.name: Nursing Home_condition_1
fields.value: is licensed by the appropriate licensing agency to engage primarily in providing nursing care and related services to inpatients; and

fields.name: Nursing Home_condition_2
fields.value: provides 24-hour a day nursing service; and

fields.name: Nursing Home_condition_3
fields.value: has a nurse on duty or on call at all times; and

fields.name: Nursing Home_condition_4
fields.value: maintains clinical records for all patients.

fields.name: Nursing Home_exclusions_intro
fields.value: Nursing Home does not include:

fields.name: Nursing Home_exclusion_1
fields.value: facilities or parts thereof used or licensed as an Assisted Living Facility; or

fields.name: Nursing Home_exclusion_2
fields.value: convalescent homes, board and rest homes, homes for the aged, residential care facilities, domiciliary and retirement care facilities, or training centers; or

fields.name: Nursing Home_exclusion_3
fields.value: government or veterans facilities or any other facility where the patient is not required to pay.

fields.name: page_number
fields.value: Page 6
